mapper.insert: insert into pay_order(user_id, product_id, product_name, order_id, order_time, total_amount, status, create_time, update_time) values(#{userId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{orderId}, #{orderTime}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update pay_order set pay_url = #{payUrl}, status = #{status}, update_time = now() where order_id = #{orderId}
update pay_order set status = #{status}, pay_time = now(), update_time = now() where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, order_id, order_time, total_amount, status, pay_url from pay_order where user_id = #{userId} and product_id = #{productId} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.update: update pay_order set status = 'CLOSE', pay_time = now(), update_time = now() where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT order_id as orderId FROM pay_order WHERE status = 'PAY_WAIT' AND NOW() >= order_time + INTERVAL 10 MINUTE ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 50
SELECT order_id as orderId FROM pay_order WHERE status = 'PAY_WAIT' AND NOW() >= order_time + INTERVAL 1 MINUTE ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10
